name: dank
content:
dank adjective
(COLD AND WET)
Add to word list
Add to word list
(especially of buildings and air) wet, cold, and unpleasant: a dank, dark cellar In the cathedral vaults the air was dank and stale.

dank adjective
(GOOD)
slang of good quality: The food was dank but the service was terrible.
slang very attractive: I like your trainers - they're dank.
